DocAttribute.Name: Directrix
DocAttribute.Documentation: The curve used to define the sweeping operation. The solid is generated by sweeping the SELF\IfcSweptAreaSolid.SweptArea along the Directrix.

DocAttribute.Name: StartParam
DocAttribute.Documentation: The parameter value on the Directrix at which the sweeping operation commences.

DocAttribute.Name: EndParam
DocAttribute.Documentation: The parameter value on the Directrix at which the sweeping operation ends.
